solution_line_template: The number of musicians in the orchestra is {males_orchestra} + {females_orchestra} = <<{males_orchestra}+{females_orchestra}={orchestra_musicians}>>{orchestra_musicians}.
The number of musicians in the band is {band_multiplier} * {orchestra_musicians} = <<{band_multiplier}*{orchestra_musicians}={band_musicians}>>{band_musicians}.
The number of students in the choir is {males_choir} + {females_choir} = <<{males_choir}+{females_choir}={choir_musicians}>>{choir_musicians}.
